The complete modern platform for athletics organisers

Our open cloud platform saves time for organisers and volunteers and makes it more fun for participants, helping the sport to grow.

Results Capture/Publishing

Working with European Athletics and the World Wide Web Consortium, we have developed the open standard for the interchange of data in athletics. This common language allows the athletics world to communicate simply and meeting organisers to display their results to the world.

Display live results on our website and app platform. All formats and devices.

Our commitment to open data means you can publish results anywhere

Enter the data via our easy to use input screens or if IT literate send us the data in a JSON feed

Visualise and assess team performance and scores

Validated. Real time. Syndicated. Searchable.

Taking Race Entries

We take entries and help organisers for over 80 events each year. From 7 County Athletics championships with up to 1,000 entries, and the biggest open meetings, to small fun runs, we can help you.

Electronic Payments into your account

Intelligent entries process (no U11s throwing the hammer!)

Check national licensing

Monitor entries and payments

Produce automatic reports for officials and athletes

Federation Management

Our Federation management package is currently being used by 4 countries and allows them to efficiently manage their athletes and competitions.

Organise your athletes’ licensing

Keep track of club memberships

Manage your national championships

Competition Management

If you want to run an entire athletics meeting from entries to results then our system, though new, has been tested at International events (Loughborough International, Balkan U18 Champs and the European 10,000M Cup) down to local open meetings.

Learn more about our product

Fully customise your event

Full management of athletics matches

Bulk entry of athletes and centralised datastore

Automated numbering, ranking and seeding

Integrated finish line technology

Validated results recording using a handful of devices

Learn more about our product
